mean_en: an imaginary animal that looks like a horse and has a straight horn growing from the middle of its forehead
word_etyma: uni一个，单一+corn角→一个角→独角兽
short_phrase: the pink-haired unicorn and the castle
sentence: When I was a little girl, I dreamed of having a unicorn as my pet.
sentence_trans: 当我还是个小女孩时，我幻想着养一头独角兽做宠物。
